body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Directions & Transportation     Maps              Maps          Locating Liberty Island and Ellis Island  Departure points are located in:   Battery Park, New York (Google; Bing) Liberty State Park, New Jersey (Google; Bing).       Navigating through New York and New Jersey  New York City Subway (MTA): Website | Maps Port Authority of NY & NJ (PATH): Website | Maps New Jersey Transit Light Rail (HBLR): Website | Maps New York Waterways: Website | Terminals New York Harbor Parks: Website | Maps                 - - - - - - - - - - - Ferries from Battery Park, New York follow the black line. All ferries travel first to Liberty Island and then to Ellis Island before returning to Battery Park, New York. - - - - - - - - - - - Ferries from Liberty State Park, New Jersey follow the blue line. All ferries travel first to Ellis Island and then to Liberty Island before returning to Liberty State Park, New Jersey.
title: Statue Of Liberty National Monument: Maps
